definition.text: Nodes might have a config -only when needed- that it is used to store information related to that node. When they do, they usually allow users to access it via one of the Node's Menu items.  A Node's Config is later used by Tasks or Bots during their processing.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode.
